DOC.brief_summary: To examine whether multiple dos oxytocin different effect behavior neural index male high low trait anxiety .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Effect Oxytocin Males With High Low Trait Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , healthy male subject ' trait anxiety level assess sub-trait inventory State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) . According subject ' trait anxiety score , divide high low anxiety experimental group . Next , experiment investigate acute effect ( single dose ) chronic effect ( 3 dose 5 dos ) oxytocin brain functional connectivity resting-state brain activation response watch emotional stimulus use functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) . Also brain structure data ( T1 diffusion tensor imaging , DTI ) subject collect . After finish scan task , subject require rate emotional valence , intensity arousal picture show scanner . During course study subject complete number questionnaire : Empathy Quotient ( EQ ) , Cheek Buss Shyness scale ( CBSS ) , Interpersonal Reactivity Index ( IRI ) , Childhood Trauma Questionnaire ( CTQ ) , Beck depression inventory ( BDI ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , Autism Spectrum Quotient ( ASQ ) , Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale ( LSAS ) , Positive Negative Affect Schedule ( PANAS ) , d2 attention test , Visual Analogue Scale anxiety .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : healthy adult male Exclusion : past current psychiatric neurological disorder head trauma substance abuse medication fMRI contraindication ( e.g . metal implant )
